channel.title: Computational Chemistry on Giulio Barletta
channel.description: Recent content in Computational Chemistry on Giulio Barletta

item.title: Energy-GNoME
item.description: This repository contains the database, documentation, Python library (coming soon), and notebooks used to build the Energy-GNoME database.

item.title: Energy-GNoME: A Living Database of Selected Materials for Energy Applications
item.description: This paper presents the novel Energy-GNoME database and the related protocol. Preprint published on arXiv, 2024.
